attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Use list_available_tools meta-tool with include_source=true. Pick a tool that could be improved (e.g., one with unclear description or missing error handling). Set Evaluation.toolName to its name.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Review the implementation of tool {{ Evaluation.toolName }}. Identify issues: unclear description, missing input validation, poor error handling, inefficient logic. Store issues in Evaluation.issues array.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Based on Evaluation.issues, use propose_tool_improvement meta-tool to suggest concrete improvements for {{ Evaluation.toolName }}. Include specific code changes or description improvements.

attributes.name: prompt
attributes.value: Display the proposed improvements for {{ Evaluation.toolName }} and explain their benefits.
